name: The Bears and the Bees
summary: Two bear cubs find some honey in a tree stump and escape the wrath of the bees when a big, mean bear chases them away and does the suffering for them.
info:
• 中文名: 熊和蜜蜂
  • 话数: 1
  • 上映年度: 1932-07-09
  • 片长: 6min
  • 语言: 无对白
  • 制片国家/地区: 美国
  • 导演: Wilfred Jackson
